title: Adam Richman Eats Britain
overview: Food explorer Adam Richman will use the British map as his menu planning his route via places that share their name with a much-loved dish or iconic ingredient.From Sandwich to Scone, Cheddar to Bakewell and beyond, Adam Richman Eats Britain sees our host explore the local namesakes and other treats, as he meets brilliant chefs and food creators all over the country and delves into the history, ingredients, and secrets of famous local fayre.
